long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What is it?
Say goodbye to email overload, and respond to emails faster than ever before. Our extension seamlessly integrates with your inbox, allowing you to generate quick replies to messages directly from an email message.

How to use it?
1. Create an account at chattyextension.com
2. Install the app and configure it with your OpenAI API key.
3. Click Quick Reply on any email in your inbox.
